sentences.sContent: A rapacious divorcee on the prowl; ravening creditors; paying taxes to voracious governments.
sentences.sContent_eng: A rapacious divorcee on the prowl; ravening creditors; paying taxes to voracious governments.
sentences.sCn: 一个四处徘徊的贪婪的离婚者；贪婪的债主；交税给贪婪的政府。

words.tran: 贪婪的；渴望的；狼吞虎咽的

trans.tranCn: 狼吞虎咽的； 贪婪的
